roleset.name: cause to be/show to be invalid
roleset.note: INVALIDATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'invalidate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from invalidate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: boring
example.text: The Thurmond bill would establish a federally administered death sentence for 23 crimes, most of which were formerly punishable by death under federal statutes that the Supreme Court invalidated *trace*.
